<a name="Component"></a>
## type [Component](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/component/component.go#L27-L42>)

Component captures catalog metadata for an action or reaction

```go
type Component struct {
    ID           uuid.UUID
    ProviderID   uuid.UUID
    Provider     Provider
    Kind         Kind
    Name         string
    DisplayName  string
    Description  string
    Version      int
    Enabled      bool
    CreatedAt    time.Time
    UpdatedAt    time.Time
    Metadata     map[string]any
    InputSchema  map[string]any
    OutputSchema map[string]any
}
```

<a name="Config"></a>
## type [Config](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/component/config.go#L10-L21>)

Config stores user\-specific configuration for a component

```go
type Config struct {
    ID          uuid.UUID
    UserID      uuid.UUID
    ComponentID uuid.UUID
    Name        string
    Params      map[string]any
    SecretsRef  *string
    Active      bool
    CreatedAt   time.Time
    UpdatedAt   time.Time
    Component   *Component
}
```

<a name="Kind"></a>
## type [Kind](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/component/component.go#L10>)

Kind enumerates the supported component roles exposed by services

```go
type Kind string
```

<a name="KindAction"></a>

```go
const (
    // KindAction represents an action component (trigger)
    KindAction Kind = "action"
    // KindReaction represents a reaction component (effect)
    KindReaction Kind = "reaction"
)
```

<a name="Provider"></a>
## type [Provider](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/component/component.go#L20-L24>)

Provider describes a third\-party integration exposing components

```go
type Provider struct {
    ID          uuid.UUID
    Name        string
    DisplayName string
}
```
